column4: Latest;Preah Sihanouk Province:------ Authorities raided an illegal cigarette factory In O’Oknha Heng commune
column8: 2020. The site was reportedly registered as a rubber/nylon processing factory.------According to a preliminary report from the police
column9: the crackdown was carried out following a complaint by the ESSE cigarette company
column10: which found that the factory was producing counterfeit ESSE cigarettes. After the inspection
column11: the police confiscated machinery and related equipment.------Legal proceedings have been launched. ------KBN
